sources.full_text_concat:
Râvaṇavaha oder Setubandha
          Siegfried Goldschmidt
          Karl J. Trübner / Trübner & Co.
          Strassburg / London
          1880
          Digital copy available via

content.value:
The published edition from which this e-text was transcribed is printed in the Devanāgarī
          script. The electronic text below is in a lossless transliteration using the Latin
          alphabet. The transliteration scheme used is the IAST (
The International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration

). IAST differs in small
          ways from ISO 15919, but is preferred by most working Sanskrit scholars. Conversion of
          this file to ISO 15919 can be achieved by performing the following replacements throughout
          the file:
Diaereses are used to differentiate disyllabic aï and aü from monosyllabic ai and au.

          Completed markup for verse structure

Version 1.0

            comments.

children.text: kiṃ taṃ jeṇa ṇa haranti kavvālāvā
taha vi hu se ṇatthi jīvie āsaṅgho
ṇa ṇiattei ṇaliṇī muhaṃ miva kamalaṃ
taṃ ca kare khea-ṇīsahaṃ va ṇisaṇṇaṃ
diṭṭho pīo ṇu pucchio ṇu paüttiṃ
jammi vi aṅgammi rāhaveṇa ṇa ṇimiaṃ
āṇa vva balāi se vilaggaï diṭṭhī
ia siri-pavaraseṇa-viraïe dahamuhavahe mahākavve paḍhumo āsāsao samatto
dharaṇīa va ṇiggamaṃ disāṇa va ṇilaaṃ
kittīa va suurisaṃ pahāe vva raviṃ

ia siri-pavaraseṇa-viraïe kālidāsa-kae dahamuhavahe mahākavve biio āsāsao
          parisamatto
tumhe pāuṃ pi phala-rasaṃ va samuddaṃ
dhīra ccia honti saṃsae vi samatthā
kaha te hattha-ṭṭhiaṃ ṇa pāhenti jasaṃ
jo vi khavijjaï khaāṇaleṇa vi bahuso
doṇha vi kiṃ hoi dukkaraṃ boleuṃ
suhassa kira ṇāsaṇiṃ vimuñcaü mā dā
maülei ccia phalaṃ ṇa dāvei sirī
taṃ cia raaṇīsu kiṃ ṇa muñcaï lacchī
hojja va ṇa hojja va samaṃ
amhehi kaaṃ pi kiṃ uṇa akīrantaṃ
garuaṃ pi bharaṃ dharenti ṇavara suurisā
tumha ṇa āṇe aṇāhio maha appā
puriseṇa ciraṃ jīviaṃ ṇa a ṇimmāṇaeṇaṃ
ea vi sirīa diṭṭhaā ke saralacchiāe
tassa ṭhio esa paḍihaḍo majjha bhuo

ia siri-pavaraseṇa-viraïe kālidāsa-kae dahamuhavahe mahākavve taïo āsāsao
          parisamatto
pattā harisa-bharentī vi visaharassa va diṭṭhī
aṇuhūāhi vi mahaṃ suaṃ cia garuaṃ
paḍivakkhassa vi ṇa tārisaṃ dei bhaaṃ
sa ccia aṇṇaṃ puṇo vilaggaï āṇā
ārambho ccia ṇa hoi kiṃ avasāṇaṃ
kaha kāhii sāaro tahiṃ cia dhīraṃ
dei pavaṃgāṇa piaï so ccea jasaṃ
mae vi abbhatthio ṇa mocchihi dhīraṃ
vasihii aṇṇassa kaha tahiṃ cia roso
diṭṭhi-viso taṃ puṇo ṇa pecchaï biio
ia siri-pavaraseṇa-viraïe dahamuhavahe mahākavve caüttho āsāsao
o ṇe virahejja jīviaṃ ti visaṇṇo
eṇaṃ sā ṇūṇa ṇindaï tti miaṅko
eeṇa ṇia tti se ṇahaṃ pi bahu-maaṃ
ṇatthi samuddo tti dāruṇaṃ va païṇṇaṃ
te ccea puṇo vi vijjhavei samuddo
taha vi hu raaṇāaro ṇa bhañjaï pasaraṃ
piaṃ ti tuha vippiaṃ mae kaha vi kaaṃ
hīraï ṇa uṇo tamappaṇa ccia kusumaṃ
ṇajjaï ṇa muanti mahi-alaṃ ti mahiharā
mīṇa-ulāi avi a siḍhilenti jīviaṃ ṇa a ṇadī harāiṃ
avaseso vi ṇatthi timiruggamāṇa jaha canda-ṇāsiāṇaṃ
paḍiaṃ phuḍio a jo dharijjaï selo
tehi ṇa uahiṃ ṇiā kaīhi mahiharā
ia siri-pavaraseṇa-viraïe dahamuhavahe mahākavve chaṭṭho āsāsao
kattha gaa tti salileṇa ṇajjanti dharā
kiṃ paḍiaṃ ṇa hoi siharaṃ saaṃ dalāiṃ
diṭṭhiṃ dei rāhavo kaha vi jā ṇaīṇaṃ
tā virahei ṇavara hiaammi jāṇaī ṇaṃ

rasaï rasāalaṃ dalaï meiṇī ṇisubbhanti jalaa-ṇivahā parīi gaaṇaṅgaṇe
              kavi-aṇo

osubbhanti mahiharā mahiharāhihao sāaro vi suiraṃ thalammi gholaï
              amukka-viaṇo

kusuma-pasāhaṇaṃ miva sa-muddha-pallavaṃ sāarammi paḍiāṇa viḍava-laggaṃ
              dumāvalīṇaṃ
mā hu ṇamejja garuaṃ puṇo rāma-dhaṇuṃ
daliaṃ va rasāalaṃ dhuo vva samuddo
jāā te ccea ṇiggamā vi ṇaīṇaṃ
khuhio sāaro rasaï uṇṇaaṃ ṇa īṇaṃ
jaṃ khaliaṃ aīi salilaṃ ṇaīṇa ūraṃ
so ccia aṇṇo puṇo puṇo vi samuddo
jhīṇa vva mahī kaāvasāṇaṃ va ṇahaṃ
ṇaṭṭhaṃ va rasāalaṃ ṇisaṇṇaṃ va jaaṃ
darīsu jassa a puṇo vi lagganti ṇahaṃ
ia siri-pavaraseṇa-viraïe dahamuhavahe mahākavve suvelavaṇṇaṇo ṇavamo āsāsao
ṇolleï va pacchao dharei va purao
ṇa saṃṭhavei alaaṃ ṇa pucchaï dūiṃ
samuhaṃ aliaṃ pi jaṃ bhaṇaï dūi-jaṇo
dei khalantullāve ṇava-vahu-satthe visūria-raaṃ pi dhiiṃ
ṇa paṇāmei aharaṃ ṇa moei balā
ṇa a so ehii ihuggae vi paose
maaṇeṇa ṇu do vi te ṇiā aïbhūmiṃ
aṇṇammi vi cintiammi sa ccia hiae
jaha ṇa viṇijjantaṇaṃ piāhi ṇa ṇāo
ṇa a hasiūṇa aṇusoiuṃ ṇa a tiṇṇo
muheṇa aṇṇeṇa se kaha vi ṇimmaviaṃ
rāma-siraṃ ti bhaṇie gaa ccia mohaṃ
jaṇassa kiṃ hoi bandhavo ccia saraṇaṃ
tīe hiaammi paaṇuaṃ pi ṇa diṭṭhaṃ
kiṃ eaṃ ti gaaṇe disāsu a samaaṃ
vaaṇaṃ maraṇaṃ ca se kaha vi appāṇo
alaaṃ tīa vihalo ṇa pāvaï hattho
diṭṭhaṃ sahiaṃ ca tuha mae avasāṇaṃ
jaṃ mocchihimi tti saṃṭhiaṃ maha hiae
dacchāmi tumaṃ ti jīviaṃ kaha vi mae
phaliā vi maṇorahā ṇa pūrenti mahaṃ
hoi phuḍaṃ ṇāha tuha muhaṃ ti paruṇṇaṃ
āsā-bandho vi me ṇa rumbhaï hiaaṃ
majjha kaeṇa maraṇaṃ pi de paḍivaṇṇaṃ
ajja vi dharaï akaaṇṇuaṃ maha hiaaṃ
kaha pattiasi dharaṇī dharei tti siraṃ
rottavvaṃ de puṇo païssa vi aṅke
jāṇantī jaha imaṃ ahaṃ pi visaṇṇā
ajja vi kiṃ tujjha rāhave aggahaṇaṃ
ajja vi kiṃ tujjha rāhave aggahaṇaṃ
pecchāmi a ṇaṃ puṇo dharemi a jīaṃ
dhūmāi ccia ṇa pajjalaï me hiaaṃ
dhuvvaï bāheṇa se ṇa rumbhaï diṭṭhī
pia tti sīāi ṇa caïaṃ vāhattuṃ
ṇa dei aṅgammi sā parammi va paharaṃ
mā raaṇiari tti me juucchasu vaaṇaṃ
jaṃ surahiṃ taṃ laāṇa geṇhaï kusumaṃ
jaï aliaṃ sahi ṇa hojja rāhava-maraṇaṃ
jaha saṃbhāvesi taha imaṃ jaï hontaṃ
pattia kassa vi pio kulassa viṇāso
ṇa samā ekkā a sā ṇisā rahuvaïṇo
ṇa a visahanti pasaraṃ parassa ṇisiarā
ṇīa ccia sāraṇo ṇa bandhaï kavaaṃ
ia siri-pavaraseṇa-viraïe dahamuhavahe mahākavve bāraho āsāsao
giriṇā bhajjaï raho ṇa uṇa ucchāho
jīaṃ muaï samuhaṃ paharaṇaṃ va bhaḍo
vaḍḍhantaṃ pi aṇahaṃ ṇa pattiaï jasaṃ
paḍaï ṇahāhi gaaṇaṃ vilaggaï ṇu rao
paraṃ pamāṇaṃ gaaṃ pi vaḍḍhaï jujjhaṃ
ṇa ṇīi samaraṃ dasāṇaṇo tti gaṇento
suo jahiṃ jassa vialio vi ṇiṇāo
ṇa muaï paḍiaṃ pi rāhavaṃ kaï-seṇṇaṃ
ṇatthi vaṇe jaṃ ṇa ei vihi-pariṇāmo
jaṃ me ṇa ṇiā vibhīsaṇaṃ rāa-sirī
ṇa viṇajjaï te kahiṃ gaā sara-ṇivahā
sajalo vva ghaṇo ṇahammi dīsaï ṇīlo
ia siri-pavaraseṇa-viraïe dahamuhavahe mahākavve caüddaho āsāsao
taṃ cia vo haraï jīviaṃ pavaa-vaī
ṇa vi taha rāmo tti ciraṃ
jaha tīa pio tti sabahumāṇaṃ diṭṭho
te ccia vaccha-tthalassa se ṇa pahuttā
so ccia veo a se paatta-halahalo
mamammi ṇīle vva ravi-sue vva dahamuhaṃ
ṇa a ṇaï-vappaṃ sama-tthaliṃ va vaṇa-gao
kesariṇo vaṇa-gaaṃ va mā haraha mahaṃ
ṇa muaï ṇihaaṃ pi rāvaṇaṃ rāa-sirī

ia siri-pavaraseṇa-viraïe kālidāsa-kae dahamuhavahe mahākavve pañcaraho āsāsao
          parisamatto
